Comment.Text: Shooter Keyboard Control A test of the SSVEP Shooter game by using keyboard. Use this scenario to test the stimulator. You can modify the order in which the targets appear in the SSVEP Shooter Controller box. Each number represents a target at position N * 45 degrees. After destruction of the last target, the stimulator application will close automatically. Available controls : [S] -> Start the experiment [8] -> Shoot [4] -> Turn the ship clockwise [6] -> Turn the ship counter-clockwise
